resources.string:
Instant Quiz \n You will get Instant Quiz after staring of ICC Cricket World Cup 2019 and this quiz will be from highlight of previous day match
Quiz Guideline  There will be a total of at least 80 Quizzes of 3 different types as Seen Quiz, Match Prediction Quiz and Instant Quiz  To be eligible for winner, one has to participate at least 60% of total quizzes  Listed 1st gifts will be acquired for highest quiz scorer and rest gifts will be distributed according to quiz score  In case of same quiz score, winner will be selected by using Automatic Algorithm Methodology  Premium Gifts are applicable only for doctors
Live Live ICC Cricket World Cup Match will telecast
Highlight You will get brief highlights of last day match
